Bananas

Fresh Sliced Bananas! If you don't see them in our topping bar, just ask the cashier to get you some.

Berries

We offer a mix of fresh seasonal berries! Blueberries and/or blackberries are most common.

Cherries

Despite the short fruiting season, Americans consume an average of 1.5 pounds of cherries each year.

Dragon Fruit

The Dragon Fruit is an exotic cactus fruit that has a delicately sweet and mildly acidic flavor, reminiscent of watermelon, cactus pear, and kiwi.

Kiwi

Unlike carrots, Kiwi are actually good for your eyes and are sometimes referred to as "Peeper Keepers"

Pineapple

Pineapples take a whopping 18-20 months to become ready to harvest!

Strawberries

Yogurt Brothers sells more than 1,000 pounds of fresh strawberries each year!
